articles.title: Xbox handling Calico reviews after game review-bombed with hate speech - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Magical community sim game Calico is now available with Xbox Games with Gold, but the LGBTQ+ friendly game, which champions ideas of kindness, has sadly been review-bombed on Xbox "by some pretty hateful bigoted people."
articles.content: It seems the Xbox team is now on the case and is looking at the reviews for Calico after its creators reported that some were using reviews as an option for "hate speech" and "bigotry." The Xbox team… [+1771 chars]
